001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.control;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.BolusPermissionRequest;
011
012/**
013 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.BolusPermissionRequest}, opCode -93, size 6
014 *
015 * <br>
016 *
017 * 
018 * <table border='1'>
019 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
020 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-93</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
021 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>6</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
022 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
023 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.BolusPermissionRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>minApi</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.KnownApiVersion#API_V2_5}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * </table>
028 */
029@MessageProps(
030    opCode=-93,
031    size=6, // 30 with 24 byte hmac padding
032    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
033    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL,
034    request=BolusPermissionRequest.class,
035    minApi=KnownApiVersion.API_V2_5,
036    signed=true
037)
038public class BolusPermissionResponse extends Message {
039    
040    private int status;
041    private int bolusId;
042    private int nackReasonId;
043    
044    public BolusPermissionResponse() {}
045    
046    public BolusPermissionResponse(int status, int bolusId, int nackReasonId) {
047        this.cargo = buildCargo(status, bolusId, nackReasonId);
048        this.status = status;
049        this.bolusId = bolusId;
050        this.nackReasonId = nackReasonId;
051        
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * <table border="1">
056     * <caption>Parsed fields for BolusPermissionResponse:</caption>
057     * <tr><td><code>status</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
058     * <tr><td><code>bolusId</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 1)</code></td></tr>
059     * <tr><td><code>nackReasonId</code></td><td><code>raw[5]</code></td></tr>
060     * </table>
061     */
062    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
063        raw = removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
064        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
065        this.cargo = raw;
066        this.status = raw[0];
067        this.bolusId = Bytes.readShort(raw, 1);
068        this.nackReasonId = raw[5];
069        
070    }
071
072    
073    /**
074     * <table border="1">
075     * <caption>Byte layout for BolusPermissionResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
076     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
077     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) status</code></td></tr>
078     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
079     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
080     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>new byte[]{0} [element 0]</code></td></tr>
081     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>new byte[]{0} [element 1]</code></td></tr>
082     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>(byte) nackReason</code></td></tr>
083     * </table>
084     */
085    public static byte[] buildCargo(int status, int bolusId, int nackReason) {
086        return Bytes.combine(
087            new byte[]{ (byte) status }, 
088            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(bolusId),
089            new byte[]{0, 0},
090            new byte[]{ (byte) nackReason }
091        );
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * @return 0 if successful
096     */
097    public int getStatus() {
098        return status;
099    }
100    public int getBolusId() {
101        return bolusId;
102    }
103    public int getNackReasonId() {
104        return nackReasonId;
105    }
106
107    public NackReason getNackReason() {
108        return NackReason.fromId(nackReasonId);
109    }
110
111    public enum NackReason {
112        PERMISSION_GRANTED(0),
113        INVALID_PUMPING_STATE(1),
114        PUMP_HAS_PERMISSION(3),
115        MPP_STATE_WAITING_FOR_RESPONSE(-1),
116        MPP_STATE_UNKNOWN_NACK_REASON(-3),
117
118        ;
119        private int id;
120        NackReason(int id) {
121            this.id = id;
122        }
123
124        public static NackReason fromId(int id) {
125            for (NackReason r : values()) {
126                if (r.id == id) {
127                    return r;
128                }
129            }
130            return null;
131        }
132    }
133
134    /**
135     * @return true when bolus permission was granted
136     */
137    public boolean isPermissionGranted() {
138        return status == 0 && getNackReason() == NackReason.PERMISSION_GRANTED;
139    }
140
141}
